trans-unit.source: Provides data for the directory events: <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed"></xref>, <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created"></xref>, <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted"></xref>.

The FileSystemEventArgs class is passed as a parameter to event handlers for these events: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed> event occurs when changes are made to the size, system attributes, last write time, last access time, or security permissions in a file or directory in the specified <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> of a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>.
trans-unit.target: FileSystemEventArgs 類別當做參數傳遞至這些事件的事件處理常式︰<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>的大小，進行變更時，就會發生事件系統屬性、 上次寫入時間、 上次存取時間或在檔案或目錄中指定<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>的<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher></xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>的安全性權限</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Changed>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created> event occurs when a file or directory in the specified <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> of a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>檔案或目錄中指定時，就會發生事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>的<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>建立。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Created>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted> event occurs when a file or directory in the specified <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> of a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> is deleted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>檔案或目錄中指定時，就會發生事件<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A>的<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>被刪除。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Path%2A> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Deleted>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.FileSystemEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes"></xref> values, which represents the kind of change detected in the file system.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes"></xref>值，表示檔案系統中偵測到變更種類。

trans-unit.source: The root directory of the affected file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 受影響的檔案或目錄的根目錄。

trans-unit.source: The name of the affected file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 受影響的檔案或目錄的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of directory event that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 取得目錄的事件發生的型別。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes"></xref> values that represents the kind of change detected in the file system.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.IO.WatcherChangeTypes"></xref>值，表示檔案系統中偵測到變更的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualifed path of the affected file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 取得的完整路徑的受影響的檔案或目錄。

trans-unit.source: The path of the affected file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 受影響的檔案或目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the affected file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 取得受影響的檔案或目錄的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name returned by the Name property is the relative path of the affected file or directory, with respect to the directory being watched.
trans-unit.target: Name 屬性所傳回的名稱是受影響的檔案或目錄，相對於正在監看的目錄的相對路徑。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher> object is watching the directory "C:\temp" and the file at "C:\temp\test\file.txt" changes, the Name property will return "test\file.txt".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>物件監看的目錄"C:\temp"和"C:\temp\test\file.txt 」 變更的檔案，[名稱] 屬性會傳回"test\file.txt"。</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>

trans-unit.source: The name of the affected file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 受影響的檔案或目錄的名稱。
